CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Autonomous Vehicles relative to Rural Logistics?
SRP.A: Autonomous Vehicles is {below} Rural Logistics in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {International Freight}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Rural Logistics}.

VE.Q: What is Autonomous Vehicles's Delivery Time in 1964?
VE.A: Autonomous Vehicles's delivery time in 1964 is {3.11} days.

VE.Q: What is Drone Delivery's Delivery Time in 1962?
VE.A: Drone Delivery's delivery time in 1962 is {2.18} days.

VE.Q: What is International Freight's Delivery Time in 1964?
VE.A: International Freight's delivery time in 1964 is {3.18} days.

VE.Q: What are the delivery time of Rural Logistics, Autonomous Vehicles, and Drone Delivery in 1962?
VE.A: Rural Logistics's delivery time is {1.64} days, Autonomous Vehicles's delivery time is {1.84} days, Drone Delivery's delivery time is {2.18} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum delivery time is {1.13} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum delivery time is {3.52} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Delivery Time level recorded for Autonomous Vehicles?
EVJ.A: Autonomous Vehicles reached approximately {3.11} days in {1964}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Delivery Time level recorded for Autonomous Vehicles?
EVJ.A: Autonomous Vehicles's lowest recorded level is approximately {1.84} days in {1962}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Delivery Time?
SC.A: The average total delivery time is {11.31} days.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Delivery Time fall between 10.69 and 11.82 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time exceed 11.69 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time go below 10.83 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1962, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1962 and 1963?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1961 and 1962 was {smaller} than between 1962 and 1963.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1961, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1959 and 1966?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1960 and 1961 was {smaller} than between 1959 and 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1964, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1959 and 1960?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1961 and 1964 was {smaller} than between 1959 and 1960.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1963, was the average total Delivery Time higher or lower than between 1960 and 1966?
NC.A: The average total delivery time between 1959 and 1963 was {higher} than between 1960 and 1966.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {International Freight} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Rural Logistics, Standard Shipping, Drone Delivery, Autonomous Vehicles, International Freight}.
